long_description: Lightweight and easy to pack, the 3-liter Versa Tank/Shower from Seattle Sports makes it easy to haul and heat water, and then enjoy a short shower during your backcountry adventures. This multifunctional item features attachments to turn the reservoir into a hydration tank, solar camp shower, and water carrier all in one. Slide lock bar provides secure, leak-free transportation and features an ergonomic hand-hold grip for easy carrying. Seattle Sports Versa Tank Shower/Reservoir is PVC- and BPA-free. Seattle Sports Versa Tank/Shower includes interchangeable tubing, shower nozzle, bite valve and twist cap.
short_description: Lightweight and easy to pack, the 3-liter Versa Tank/Shower from Seattle Sports makes it easy to haul and heat water, and then enjoy a short shower during your backcountry adventures.
